Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the characters in *Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3*?
Options:
A. Kraglin was once under the command of Yondu Udonta.
B. Michael Rooker plays the role of Yondu Udonta.
C. Kraglin is a member of the Guardians.
D. All of the above

Question: Which statements are true regarding Tara Strong and Mainframe in the Guardians films?
Options:
A. a) Tara Strong voices Mainframe in the Disney+ series Loki.
B. b) Mainframe appears as a character in the first two Guardians films.
C. c) Tara Strong voiced Mainframe in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2.
D. d) All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Miley Cyrus and the character Mainframe in the Guardians films?
Options:
A. a) Miley Cyrus voiced Mainframe in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2.
B. b) Mainframe is a character that appears in the first two Guardians films.
C. c) Miley Cyrus is credited for her role as Mainframe in the Guardians films.
D. d) Mainframe does not appear in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3.
Answer: a) Miley Cyrus voiced Mainframe in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2. and b) Mainframe is a character that appears in the first two Guardians films.
